messages.title: Championing the Eastern District
messages.content: Councillor Dennis Meredith has been a champion for the Eastern District of Northampton for many years. He lives in Southfields and works locally not nationally. Dennis has been lobbying the Borough Council and Northampton Partnership Homes to persuade them to take action to improve our area. He says “We are doing well but there is always more to be done and works are at various stages. To improve the area where we all live.” Soon Southfields work on a new Community Hub has started.

messages.title: Candidate discusses progress on Thorplands
messages.content: Martin Sawyer the Liberal Democrat parliamentary candidate for December’s General Election has been out in Talavera Ward recently along with your local Focus Team. He went out to look at progress on the new development at Thorplands and met Lib Dem councillor Dennis Meredith. Building new affordable homes for rent is a key policy for Liberal Democrats.

messages.title: Casework Corner
messages.content:
People sometimes ask Councillor Dennis Meredith, “What do you actually do for us Dennis?”

Dennis says, I have been very active to improve the Eastern District and below are some key things we have achieved. Supporting Lumbertubs Association. Working with Northants County Council, LITC and Hope Centre to help vulnerable families. Southfields playing field £20,000. New road surface for Downhead Crescent and Spinney Hill. Sought funding for the Pastures Community Centre. Supported solar panels for Savoy Crescent properties. Reported overgrown bushes and litter along Midsummer Meadow. Improved local bus service and Sunday bus service to stop isolation. Library and Sure Start centre supported. Southfields painting the concrete bridges. £3,000 for new equipment for Southfields Playing Field. Supported change to one way system in Haldens Parkway. Nelmes Road being added to the gritting route in the winter. New doors on flats around Walledwell Court. Agreed with Northampton Partnership Homes to position new flats where public streetlights have been removed.
